entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name` TEXT NOT NULL, `firstName` TEXT NOT NULL, `lastName` TEXT, `username` TEXT, `email` TEXT NOT NULL, `language` TEXT, `enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`email`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`itemCode` TEXT NOT NULL, `actualQty` REAL NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT NOT NULL, `barcode` TEXT NOT NULL, `image` TEXT, `itemGroup` TEXT NOT NULL, `brand` TEXT, `price` REAL NOT NULL, `valuation_rate` REAL DEFAULT 0, `discount` REAL NOT NULL, `isService` INTEGER NOT NULL, `isStocked` INTEGER NOT NULL, `stockUom` TEXT NOT NULL, `currency` TEXT NOT NULL, `is_deleted` INTEGER NOT NULL, `last_synced_at` INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY(`itemCode`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`itemId` TEXT NOT NULL, `warehouseId` TEXT NOT NULL, `reorderLevel` REAL, `reorderQty` REAL, `id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updated_at` INTEGER, `is_deleted` INTEGER NOT NULL, `companyId` TEXT NOT NULL, `instanceId` TEXT NOT NULL, `lastSyncedAt` INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY(`instanceId`, `companyId`, `itemId`, `warehouseId`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`profile_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `warehouse` TEXT NOT NULL, `route` TEXT, `country` TEXT NOT NULL, `company` TEXT NOT NULL, `currency` TEXT NOT NULL, `income_account` TEXT, `expense_account` TEXT, `branch` TEXT, `apply_discount_on` TEXT NOT NULL, `cost_center` TEXT, `selling_price_list` TEXT NOT NULL, `active` INTEGER, `user` TEXT, `is_deleted` INTEGER NOT NULL, `last_synced_at` INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY(`profile_name`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`profile_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `company` TEXT NOT NULL, `currency` TEXT NOT NULL, `is_deleted` INTEGER NOT NULL, `last_synced_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`profile_name`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`profile_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `mop_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `idx` INTEGER NOT NULL, `is_default` INTEGER NOT NULL, `allow_in_returns` INTEGER NOT NULL, `enabled_in_profile` INTEGER NOT NULL, `is_deleted` INTEGER NOT NULL, `last_synced_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`profile_id`, `mop_name`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`payment_term_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `invoice_portion` REAL, `mode_of_payment` TEXT, `due_date_based_on` TEXT, `credit_days` INTEGER, `credit_months` INTEGER, `discount_type` TEXT, `discount` REAL, `description` TEXT, `discount_validity` INTEGER, `discount_validity_based_on` TEXT, `is_deleted` INTEGER NOT NULL, `last_synced_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`payment_term_name`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `from_currency` TEXT NOT NULL, `to_currency` TEXT NOT NULL, `rate` REAL NOT NULL, `last_synced_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name` TEXT NOT NULL, `mode_of_payment` TEXT NOT NULL, `company` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `type` TEXT NOT NULL, `enabled` INTEGER NOT NULL, `currency` TEXT, `account` TEXT, `is_deleted` INTEGER NOT NULL, `last_synced_at` INTEGER DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY(`name`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `parent_invoice` TEXT NOT NULL, `mode_of_payment` TEXT NOT NULL, `amount` REAL NOT NULL, `entered_amount` REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0, `payment_currency` TEXT, `exchange_rate` REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 1.0, `payment_reference` TEXT, `remote_payment_entry` TEXT, `payment_date` TEXT, `pos_opening_entry` TEXT, `sync_status` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Pending', `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `last_synced_at` INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY(`parent_invoice`) REFERENCES `tabSalesInvoice`(`invoice_name`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )
